name: VSAccountManagerDelegate
desc: The methods you use to respond to authentication view controller requests.

items.name: func accountManager(VSAccountManager, present: UIViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to present an authentication view controller.

items.name: func accountManager(VSAccountManager, dismiss: UIViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to dismiss an authentication view controller.

items.name: func accountManager(VSAccountManager, shouldAuthenticateAccountProviderWithIdentifier: String) -> Bool
items.desc: Asks the delegate whether to authenticate the user with the selected provider.
